name: Stop and Block bots plugin Anti bots
author: Bill Minozzi

sections.description:
Anti Bots
★★★★★

Effortless bot protection for WordPress. Set up in minutes, secure your site with just a few clicks!

An Internet Bot, commonly known as a web robot, spider, crawler, or simply a bot, is a software application designed to execute automated tasks online. While some bots can be beneficial, many—such as scrapers and botnets—can consume bandwidth, slow down your server, steal content, and exploit vulnerabilities to compromise your site.

The Anti-Bot Plugin introduces an innovative approach to bot management and WordPress security. By default, it blocks all bots except those from Google and Microsoft Bing. You can also create a bot whitelist of approved bots, ensuring that only those you trust can access your site. The plugin includes a pre-configured list of approximately 20 reputable bots from major social networks, including Google and Microsoft. With our advanced learning mode, you can test the plugin and manage this list—adding or removing bots—without risking the blocking of beneficial ones. Additionally, the plugin features a visitor log to help you oversee this process.

  • stop bad bots
  • protect website from bots
  • website performance optimization

Key Features:

  • User-Friendly: Simple installation and setup with just 3-4 clicks.
  • Comprehensive Bot Protection: Effectively blocks unwanted bots, scrapers, and botnets while allowing trusted ones. Protects your website from bots and helps prevent bot attacks.
  • Customizable Whitelist: Comes with a pre-configured list of approximately 20 good bots from major social networks, including Google and Microsoft. Manage this list by adding or removing bots as needed.
  • Learning Mode: Test the plugin and build your whitelist without disrupting your site.
  • Prevents Bots from Spamming Comments and Contact Forms: Acts as a spam bot blocker.
  • Protect Your SEO: Prevents bots from stealing your content and negatively impacting your SEO.
  • Prevents Bots from Overloading Your Server: Mitigates performance degradation caused by bots, ensuring fast and seamless navigation for visitors. Site performance enhancement and helps increase website speed.
  • Brute Force Protection: Shields your login form from brute force attack protection.
  • Performance Friendly: No effect on site speed, no DNS or Cloud Traffic Redirection, and no risk of Google penalties for slow sites. Provides website security plugin and automated bot defense.

For enhanced protection, consider our free StopBadBots plugin, which offers additional features to tackle more sophisticated threats. Please note that this option may require a slightly longer installation time due to its advanced capabilities and is designed for experienced users.
Also need to protect your forms?
Install our Free Recaptcha & Cloudflare Turnstile plugin.

sections.faq:
Question:How does this plugin protect websites from bad bots?

Our Anti-Bots plugin offers robust protection against malicious bots that can harm your website. By stopping bad bots, we help protect your website from bots that consume excessive bandwidth, slow down your server, and steal your content. This plugin uses a unique approach to identify and block harmful bots while allowing beneficial ones, such as those from Google and Bing. Additionally, it contributes to website performance optimization by reducing the load on your server caused by malicious traffic.
